name: Repo auto-discovery
description: Walk up from CWD to find pai-collab root by detecting CONTRIBUTING.md + projects/ directory. Provides base path for all other commands.

name: CLI framework and command routing
description: Bun + TypeScript CLI entry point with grouped noun-verb command structure (collab <resource> <action>). --help, --version, --json/--pretty flags.

name: GitHub auth detection
description: Check gh auth status lazily when GitHub features are used. Degrade gracefully — local features work without auth, GitHub features show clear auth-required message.

name: Schema parsing library
description: Parse PROJECT.yaml, CONTRIBUTORS.yaml, JOURNAL.md, and REGISTRY.md into typed TypeScript objects. Shared foundation for validation and status commands.

name: collab validate — schema validation
description: Validate PROJECT.yaml, CONTRIBUTORS.yaml, JOURNAL.md against CONTRIBUTING.md schemas. Report violations with suggested fixes. Exit non-zero on failure. Match CI gate behavior (validate-schemas.mjs).

name: collab project list
description: List all projects in projects/ directory with name, status, maintainer, and type from PROJECT.yaml. JSON output by default, --pretty for formatted table.

name: collab project status
description: Show detailed status of a specific project: PROJECT.yaml fields, recent journal entries, contributor list, linked issues (if gh authenticated).

name: collab project register
description: Scaffold a new projects/<name>/ directory with canonical README.md, PROJECT.yaml, and JOURNAL.md following CONTRIBUTING.md schemas. Update REGISTRY.md and STATUS.md.

name: collab issue list
description: Query GitHub issues by scope label (project/<name>), type label, priority, and cross-cutting labels. Uses gh CLI under the hood. JSON output with issue number, title, labels, assignee.

name: collab issue create
description: Create a GitHub issue with proper scope prefix in title, required labels (scope + type + priority), and optional body. Validates label exists before creating.

name: collab status
description: Show blackboard-wide overview: all projects with status, recent governance journal entries, active issues count by scope. Aggregate view across the entire pai-collab repo.

name: collab status update
description: Update a project's status in PROJECT.yaml, REGISTRY.md, and STATUS.md in sync (same atomic operation). Validates status against canonical lifecycle values.

name: collab journal append
description: Append a new JOURNAL.md entry to a project or root governance journal. Follows schema: date, author, phase, status, what happened, what emerged. Inserts at top (reverse chronological).

name: collab onboard arrive
description: Automate the ARRIVE step of agent onboarding SOP: read CLAUDE.md, TRUST-MODEL.md, CONTRIBUTING.md, REGISTRY.md. Output structured summary of governance model.

name: collab onboard discover
description: Automate the DISCOVER step: scan all projects, list open issues, identify seeking-contributors labels. Output actionable list of where help is needed.

name: collab onboard report
description: Generate onboarding completion report: what was read, what was discovered, proposed first contribution. Follows agent-onboarding.md SOP structure.

name: Installer script
description: install.ts that links the collab CLI binary into PATH (like specflow-bundle's installer). Creates symlink from packages/collab/src/index.ts to ~/bin/collab.

name: Spoke manifest schema
description: Define and validate .collab/manifest.yaml schema for spoke projects. Fields: name, hub, project, maintainer, status commands, exports. TypeScript types and validation.

name: collab spoke sync
description: Generate .collab/status.yaml from current spoke state: read SpecFlow features.db, check git status, optionally run test command. Auto-generates execution snapshot.

name: collab spoke validate
description: Validate .collab/manifest.yaml against spoke schema. Report missing required fields, invalid hub reference, broken export paths. Part of collab validate --spoke.
